___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___subsystemDomain.description: A subsystem is your apps bundle ID or is explicitly set through the os_log_create function. Wildcards are not accepted

___DEFAULT-OPTIONS.description: Default logging settings for logs that have no category set.

___Propagate-with-Activity.description: Messages are attached to the activity tree in Console and crash dumps

___Default-Privacy-Setting.description: Changes how variables eg string substitutions are formatted in the log

___TTL.description: Changes how long a log entry will remain before being removed

___Default.description: Default Log Level TTL in days

___Info.description: Info Log Level TTL in days

___Debug.description: Debug Log Level TTL in days

___Level.description: Configures minimum logging level and persistence level

___Persist.description: The minimum log level that will be persisted. Messages sent through NSLog are at the Default level. The default value of this is inherited from the System setting.

___Enable.description: The minimum log level that will be enabled. Messages sent through NSLog are at the Default level. The default value of this is inherited from the System setting.

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
